item.title: Write Better Commit Messages
item.description: GIT OOPS! Question Yep… I have absolutely no idea what I meant by ‘Fix foobar’ 6 months ago. Trying to write better commits fixed bug on landing page vs.

item.title: Let’s Encrypt Wildcard Certifications
item.description: Let’s Encrypt Wildcard Certifications Assuming Debian based OS Step 1. Install certbot APT Get the latest version certbot. Update apt package manager and applications.

item.title: Modify Themes Hugo
item.description: How to modify themes Hugo Use non-destructive practice for Hugo themes. Hugo is designed for customization and follows a site generation workflow that works a lot like layers in photo editing software.

item.title: Hugo Content Organization
item.description: Content Organization Trying to find a good way to organize content and this looks like this could be completed with Page Bundles.

item.title: Hugo Improve Usability
item.description: Make Site More Informative Add Reading Time to current theme. Add Reading Time to list Page Showing Reading Time is a great addition, by helping visitors to decide if the article is interesting enough to read.

item.title: Hugo running on Android
item.description: Hugo Running on Android Assumption turmux already installed. Termux on Android needs to be install. Use apt or pkg to install hugo.

item.title: Hugo Static Blog Site Github
item.description: Hugo Setup with git This blog content is generated with Hugo static site generator and integrated with GitHub Pages. This post will step cover publishing and pushing the newest content to GitHub Pages.

item.title: VSCode Extensions for Markdown
item.description: VSCode Extensions for Markdown Recommend vscode Markdown extensions. Markdown All in One Markdown All in One is a must one for editing Markdown.

item.title: SSH Reverse Tunnel
item.description: SSH Tunnel A reverse SSH tunnel allows a local service to be securely accessible by a remote connection. Understanding Reverse SSH Tunnels Service on local computer that is running on port 80.

item.title: SSH Tunnel
item.description: SSH Tunnel How to setup a basic SSH tunnel to access remote server resources that may be blocked by a firewall or simply inaccessible over the internet.

item.title: SSH Proxy
item.description: SSH Proxy Tunnel Setup an SSH tunnel proxy server as an intermediary between a local computer and remote server that has an inaccessible resource or service.

item.title: About The Author
item.description: This blog is brought to you by an Infrastructure IT Consultant. The goal of this content is to create easy to understand posts about creating complicated projects so anyone can follow them like a recipe and to help capture my ideas and thoughts.
